title: Master Mosquiton
alternative_title: Master of Mosquiton, マスターモスキートン
description: In the 1920's, Inaho resurrects a vampire named Mosquiton with her blood. He awakens and becomes her slave. Now, Inaho is after the O-Part, which will grant her immortality. However, a bunch of supernatural monsters are out to stop them from achieving their goal.
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Adventure>, <Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Demons>, <Genre -> Supernatural>, <Genre -> Vampire>]
